title: Drivers can top up petrol tanks for free this week
text:

Owning a car is all fun and games... until it comes to paying for it. From road tax to insurance, the annual MOT and of course... the constant petrol.

So to help make your money go a little further, cashback site TopCashback has decided to offer motorists £10 worth of free fuel this week.

You can pick up your free fuel in petrol stations all across the UK - on one condition: that you get a receipt.

You'll then need to take a picture of your receipt and send it to TopCashback , who will reimburse you £10 towards the cost.

(Image: Getty)

Before sending a picture, make sure your receipt shows the date and time of your fuel purchase, as well as the petrol station the transaction was made in. If your receipt doesn't include all these things, you may not get your money reimbursed.

The deal works at any major petrol station including Tesco , Morrisons , Sainsbury’s, Asda , the Co-operative, Esso, BP, Texaco, Gulf, Jet, Murco and Shell.

To redeem the offer, new members to TopCashback can follow the five simple steps below.

How to get £10 free petrol

Sign up to TopCashback for free here Spend £10 on fuel from any of the stated petrol stations Sign back into your TopCashback account and submit your receipt. This can be done by navigating to Offers > Snap & Save Snap a picture of the receipt, showing the date and time of purchase, the petrol station name, and the item that is eligible for cashback. You can fold your receipt to show all of the required information Once receipts have been submitted, cashback will track in member’s accounts within seven working days and will become ‘payable’ within 30 days.

Sadly, the offer is only available to new members of TopCashback, and you can read the full terms and conditions on the TopCashback website.
description: You can get £10 worth of petrol for free this week - as long as you keep the receipt
